item.description:
The Revolve Nation Entrepreneurs Network is the largest community of entrepreneurs and business owners in the city of Boston, offering
networking, discussion groups, seminars, business plan hot-seats, and more! Join us here, where professionals and entrepreneurs meet in mutual support of business to network, socialize, learn, and promote a thriving community of entrepreneurs. Wine and snacks provided!

Schedule:
6pm-6:30pm -- Open Networking over wine and snacks
6:30-6:45pm -- Meeting Called to Order and Individual Introductions to group!
6:45--7:45 -- Several 10-minute discussions on topics of interest to our members (examples; Getting funded, building a management team, using mailing lists and their effectiveness, firing a difficult employee)
7:45-8pm -- More Networking! (and wine!)

Like anything in life, what you put into a networking group is what you get out of it. The Boston Entrepreneurs Group is designed for entrepreneurs and professionals who are serious about building their business, investing in relationships, and helping each other to succeed. You will get the most out of this group with regular attendance.

The way the group seeks to achieve these outcomes:
1) Regular attendance (when possible)
2) Dedication to coming prepared to contribute value to the community with expertise, experience, and network.
3) Create a fun and supportive environment!

SPONSORS:
Revolve, Inc.: www.RevolveThis.com

Exemplar Law Partners: www.exemplarlaw.com

See you all next time!
item.name: Revolve Nation Boston Entrepreneurs: Networking & Discussion Group
